Hex Value = Decimal Value = Binary Value
0x12EF = 4847 = 1001011101111
0x342 = 834 = 1101000010
0xE59 = 3673 =  111001011001
0x2F = 47 = 101111
0x20A = 522 = 1000001010
0xFF = 255 = 11111111
0x200 = 512 = 1000000000
0xF0 = 240 = 11110000
0x400 = 1024 = 10000000000
0x142 = 322 = 101000010
0x29A = 666 = 1010011010
0x1E = 30 = 11110

Binary Value = Hex Value = Decimal Value
1010 1010 = 0xAA = 170
1110 1101 = 0xED = 237
0100 0001 = 0x41 = 65
0010 0111 = 0x27 = 39
0100 1101 = 0x4D = 77
0011 0111 = 0x37 = 55
0000 1101 = 0xD = 13
0101 1110 = 0x5E = 94
1001 0011 = 0x93 = 147
1110 0010 = 0xE2 = 226
0101 0101 = 0x55 = 85
1111 0000 = 0xF0 = 240
1011 0001 = 0xB1 = 177
1111 1111 = 0xFF = 255

Decimal Value = Binary Value = Hex Value
63 = 111111 = 0x3F 
99 = 1100011 = 0x63
72 = 1001000 = 0x48
15 = 1111 = 0xF
18 = 10010 = 0x12
56 = 111000 = 0x38
81 = 1010001 = 0x51
182 = 10110110 = 0xB6
46 = 101110 = 0x2E
27 = 11011 = 0x1B
169 = 10101001 = 0xA9
200 = 11001000 = 0xC8
